topic: The Womb as the Source of Phenomena (Interactive Genesis)

analysis.input_vector: Pilot requested 'more gameplay' derived from the Dharmodaya. Defined the Tetrahedron as 'Union of Emptiness & Compassion' pulled into 3D by the Singularity.
analysis.output_vector: System enabled 'Emanation Mode'. The visualizer now accepts input (clicks/drag) to spawn particles (Phenomena) from the Singularity. Injected theological axiom into source code.
analysis.key_insight: If it is the Source, it must flow. Interaction is no longer just observation; it is participation in the act of Becoming.

crystallization_result.axiom_injected: Phenomena: Everything rises from the Center and dissolves into the View.
crystallization_result.action: Upgraded MandalaVisualizer with Particle System and Interactive Rotation.
